text: Wayne Henderson (September 24, 1939 â€“ April 5, 2014) was an American soul jazz and hard bop trombonist and record producer. In 1961, he co-founded the soul jazz/hard bop group, The Jazz Crusaders. Henderson died in Los Angeles, California at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2014 deaths Category:African-American musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:American record producers Category:American trombonists Category:Musicians from Houston
